# telnyx Provider

## Schema

# telnyx Rest Client

## Logging

To change the log level for the rest client and see verbose output such as request bodies, set the `TELNYX_REST_CLIENT_LOG_LEVEL` accordingly to `debug`, `info`, `warn`, or `error`
